name: Castle of Dr. Brain
description:
Castle of Dr. Brain is an educational adventure-puzzle game developed by Sierra Entertainment and Sierra On-Line. It came out on 01-01-1991. It was published by Sierra On-Line. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Castle of Dr. Brain on Commodore / Amiga, PC and Classic Macintosh.
It was produced by Stuart Moulder. It was directed by Lori Ann Cole. Ken Allen and Mark Seibert scored the game.
